Posts.Content: Hi there, Try the below link, i have had breast cancer also and lost my hair- i cant recommend it highly enough, the stuff is beautiful, really unusual and so comfortable.   www.headscarvesbyciara.co.uk
Posts.Title: Headwear

Posts.Content: Hi there, I had the gene test and tested positive for brca1, i had my breasts removed as a preventative measure in which they found a grade 3 breast cancer. I had the fec chemo and lost my long hair. I found amazing headscarves at www.headscarvesbyciara.co.uk which i know Lisa uses aswell. You should give it a try. xx
Posts.Title: New to all this .....

Posts.Content: Hi there, I just came across this message about having your head shaved, I am also going through breast cancer and have lost my hair, i find my wig extremely itch but found the most amazing headscarves at the below website. They are so unusual and really pretty, by far the best i have found.   Hope you are well xx www.headscarvesbyciara.co.uk
Posts.Title: has shaved my head ! :)
